analysis.description:
SocialNote.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#140-162) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lock.id == 1 && lock.amountWithDrawn < lock.totalAmount

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol:
	Contract SocialNote has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#271-272)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.7 (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_recipients' of SocialNote.batchTransfer (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#165-166) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'p_tokens' of SocialNote.batchTransfer (/unique_chucks/11/0xf7626cd230b5a4d7df4d2663c3f06778b4579ebe.sol#166) is not in mixedCase
